name: JACK
description: Stable Jack is a yield, volatility, and points market for any asset. Stable Jack provides four key value propositions: - Fixed yield on stablecoins - Leveraged yield on stablecoins, LST, and LRTs - Leveraged airdrop/points farming on any asset - Leveraged long positions on any asset without liquidation risk. Stable Jack is based on a pool model, where there is no IL, slippage, and maturity dates. In addition to this, assets on Stable Jack are principal protected.
